Class: SamlPolicy

SamlPolicy

new SamlPolicy(samlPolicyData)

Encapsualtes the SAML Policy of an Application. For more information about SAML Authentication, please see Authenticating Against a SAML Directory.

This object does not need to be manually constructed. It should be obtained from Application.getSamlPolicy()

Parameters:
Name Type Description
samlPolicyData Object

The raw JSON data of this resource, as retrieved from the Stormpath REST API.
Properties:
Name Type Description
createdAt String

The time this resource was created, ISO 8601 format.
href String

The HREF of this REST resouce.
modifiedAt String

The last time this resource was modified, ISO 8601 format.
serviceProvider.href String

The HREF of the linked SamlServiceProvider resource.
Source:
  • resource/SamlPolicy.js, line 6

Methods

getServiceProvider(getResourceOptionsopt, callback)

Get the SamlServiceProvider resource of this SAML Policy resouce.

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
getResourceOptions GetResourceOptions <optional>

Query options for the request.
callback function

Callback function, will be called with (err, samlServiceProvider).
